samples.question: Do you think you will dance in the future professionally?
samples.transcript: Professionally no, but I think I will make, many dance videos. samples.question: What do you think?
samples.transcript: This is a very tricky question. as I have seen, I think in our community, the daughters are more likely to be like their father. And it might be because of the love and caring that father has for the daughter and the daughter is usually like so spoiled and it is just the case like in some cases. So I cannot say that it applies and it is universal. and in my family, I am more like my mother. and yeah. Okay.

samples.question: In terms of personality, are people more influenced by their family or by their friends?
samples.transcript: I think that since we spend most of our time with our family, it is definitely our family. most of my characters, like my nature and, how I behave to other people, it is influenced by my mother. I learn from her and everything she does, I imitate. So if she, you know, makes, some kind of, so, okay, so if she sleeps and she says like, okay, I cannot work today, then next day I will be doing the same thing. And that is how it goes. Alright, thank you. that is the interview speaking test.

samples.question: Do you like weekends?
samples.transcript: Yes, I love weekends. After a long week, I surely would love to take some rest on the weekends.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, I love weekends. After a long week, I surely would love to take some rest on the weekends.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Yes, I love weekends. After a long week, I surely would love to take some rest on the weekends.

samples.question: How do you usually spend your weekends and why?
samples.transcript: I usually spend my weekends watching movies and series because that is my favorite activity and I do not get time for, I do not get enough time for that during the weekdays so I do that on weekends.
samples.transcript_original: I usually spend my weekends watching movies and series because that's my favorite activity and I don't get time for, I don't get enough time for that during the weekdays so I do that on weekends.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I usually spend my weekends watching movies and series because that is my favorite activity and I do not get time for, I do not get enough time for that during the weekdays so I do that on weekends.

samples.question: Which is your favorite part of the weekend?
samples.transcript: My favorite part of the weekend is the evening because I get to hang out with my friends. Going out with my friends is also another favorite activity of mine.
samples.transcript_original: My favorite part of the weekend is the evening because I get to hang out with my friends. Going out with my friends is also another favorite activity of mine.
samples.transcript_cleaned: My favorite part of the weekend is the evening because I get to hang out with my friends. Going out with my friends is also another favorite activity of mine.

samples.question: Do you think your weekends are long enough?
samples.transcript: No, I do not think my weekends are long enough because I have a lot of chores to do and one day is not enough for all those activities while enjoying myself.
samples.transcript_original: No, I don't think my weekends are long enough because I have a lot of chores to do and one day is not enough for all those activities while enjoying myself.
samples.transcript_cleaned: No, I do not think my weekends are long enough because I have a lot of chores to do and one day is not enough for all those activities while enjoying myself.

samples.question: Do you think everyone deserves weekends?
samples.transcript: Yes I believe everyone deserves a weekend after a long hectic week to spend some time with their loved ones and hang out with their friends or even to take some rest.
samples.transcript_original: Yes I believe everyone deserves a weekend after a long hectic week to spend some time with their loved ones and hang out with their friends or even to take some rest.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Yes I believe everyone deserves a weekend after a long hectic week to spend some time with their loved ones and hang out with their friends or even to take some rest.

samples.question: And my first question is, what skills and abilities do most people want to have today?
samples.transcript: Most people want to learn IT skills these days because this has been the top of discussion and everyone thinks that learning this skill will get them jobs in the future and it has been proven right a lot of times. that is why most people want to learn IT related skills.
samples.transcript_original: Most people want to learn IT skills these days because this has been the top of discussion and everyone thinks that learning this skill will get them jobs in the future and it has been proven right a lot of times. That's why most people want to learn IT related skills.

samples.question: Which skills should children learn at the school?
samples.transcript: Children should mostly learn leadership qualities and teamwork in school because there are a lot of children in a class So if they learn how to manage themselves or how to complete a project among themselves then they will have some future skills that they can use in corporate levels Which skills do you think will be important in the future I believe the most important skill in the future will be the data analysis skill because this has been the top of discussion and people have been delving into these sectors So I believe this will prove to be a very significant sector in the future.

samples.question: Which kinds of jobs have the highest salaries in your country?
samples.transcript: In my country, people related to IT sector, doctors and government officials have the highest salaries because doctors need to study for a long time. So they get paid for the most delicate surgeries. the IT sector has flourished a lot in the past few years. So they also get paid more and government officials control everything related to our country. So they have to get paid more for their hard work.
samples.transcript_original: Um, in my country, people related to IT sector, doctors and government officials have the highest salaries because doctors need to study for a long time. So they get paid for the most delicate surgeries. Um, the IT sector has flourished a lot in the past few years. So they also get paid more and government officials control everything related to our country. So they have to get paid more for their hard work.

samples.question: Are there any other jobs that you think should have high salaries?

Some people say it would be better for society if everyone got the same salary.

samples.question: What do you think about that?
samples.transcript: I do not think everyone should get the same salary because the caliber of everyone's work is not the same and everyone do not put in equal efforts in their work. For example, teachers have to go through a lot to teach children, so they should get paid more. But there are some other easy jobs that do not require that much effort or time, so they do not need to get paid the same as the teachers. Well, that is the end of your speaking test.

samples.question: Does your name have any special meaning?
samples.transcript: Yeah, I think most Vietnamese names have meanings behind them because we take after the Chinese characteristics. So each word has a meaning behind it. And my names mean blue water. I think my parents wanted me to grow up to be a righteous person and straightforward but still stand my ground and be as powerful as water.
samples.transcript_original: Yeah, I think most Vietnamese names have meanings behind them because we take after the Chinese characteristics. So each word has a meaning behind it. And my names mean blue water. I think my parents wanted me to grow up to be a righteous person and straightforward but still stand my ground and be as powerful as water.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I think most Vietnamese names have meanings behind them because we take after the Chinese characteristics. So each word has a meaning behind it. And my names mean blue water. I think my parents wanted me to grow up to be a righteous person and straightforward but still stand my ground and be as powerful as water.

samples.question: How would you choose names for your next generation?
